transArray.content: Very good accommodation. The surrounding transportation is convenient and fast, the hotel service is warm and thoughtful, and it is clean and tidy. Although the parking lot is small, there is no problem with parking.

The hotel's reply: Dear guest, hello! We are very happy to see your endless love and praise for the hotel. Your love is an encouragement and a support for us. We will redouble our efforts and thank you for your support. Every affirmation is precious to us. We look forward to your visit again and wish you a happy life!
